00013 #define SYSFILE_FROMLEOF        2
00014 #define SYSFILE_FROMMARK        3

00018 #define TEXT_LB_MAC         0x02L
00019 #define TEXT_LB_PC          0x04L
00020 #define TEXT_LB_UNIX        0x08L
